name: 阿南特·A·J·吉姆吉特波尔柴
name_full: 阿南特·A·J·吉姆吉特波尔柴 Anant A.J. Jiemjitpolchai

last_movies.title: 父母包办与自由恋爱大对决
争做超级英雄真人秀 第一季

introduction: A.J. came to California back in 1997 as a Marine stationed in 29 Palms, CA, he was transferred from North Carolina. During the time he was in the service that's where he learned military combat art from hand-to-hand and knife combat all the way to shooting a sniper rifle and missiles. A.J. started his martial arts training at the age of 11 with Shinto Ryu karate, and then followed it with traditional Muay Thai which he traveled to Thailand, Shotokan karate at the age of 16. While in the service, he joined hands with a kick-boxing instructor, they combined both kick-boxing and Muay Thai to train many Marines and spouses in the base and fought on an amateur level. After military he took some time to complete college degree where he under went public speaking courses that involves improvisation. Shortly after his degree A.J. had a privileged of getting himself involved in an entertainment industry. He's a quick learner and take directions very well.A.J. works great with kids, during Zoom he was able to do stunt rigging that involves children only. He was able to choreograph multiple fight scenes involving kids as well as adults, even adults fighting kids.
